From: Ritesh Jadhav <ritesh.jadhav@unic-nasco.com> 
Sent: Friday, 31 January 2025 4:01 PM
To: Katia Chalhoub <Katia.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>
Cc: Diana Haydar <Diana.Haydar@nascodubai.com>; Amine Azzi <amine.azzi@unic-aiaw.com>; Rayan Cutinho <rayan.cutinho@unic-nasco.com>; Uttam Khutale <Uttam.Khutale@nascodubai.com>; Swapna Pyambil <swapna.pyambil@nascodubai.com>; Collection Team <Collection-Team@nascodubai.com>; Kashif Masood <Kashif.Masood@nascosharjah.com>
Subject: Insurance Renewal Notice - KATIA LOUISE MARIE CHALHOUB

 

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Restricted

 

Dear Ms. Katia,


We are pleased to attach the renewal notice for your policies expiring in the month of March, 2025.

PAR - If not excluded, SRCC to be limited to 25% of location-wise TSI and to be no wider than LM7 wording

*	SRCC to be limited to 25% of location-wise TSI and to be no wider than LM7 wording

chunks.text:
We are pleased to attach the renewal notice for your policies expiring in the month of March, 2025.

PAR - If not excluded, SRCC to be limited to 25% of location-wise TSI and to be no wider than LM7 wording

*	SRCC to be limited to 25% of location-wise TSI and to be no wider than LM7 wording

	*	Strike, Riot and Civil Commotion (SRCC) is covered subject to following;
	*	Loss is covered up to sublimit of 25% of Total Sum Insured.
	*	Deductible: 10% of loss subject to minimum of AED 20,000
	*	Excluding looting, theft and pillage

 

Kindly confirm the renewal of policies by countersigning the attached renewal notice and returning it us by e-mail at ritesh.jadhav@unic-nasco.com <mailto:ritesh.jadhav@unic-nasco.com>  

 

With assurance of best services at all times.

Best regards,

 

Ritesh Jadhav

Officer – General Underwriting



Al Ittihad Al Watani Insurance Co. 
For Nasco Gulf Insurance Agency LLC

Al Durrah Bldg.4 – Garhoud, Mezzanine Floor, P.O. Box 3000, Dubai, UAE
T +971 4 210 6800  D +971 4 305 1775 F +971 4 351 8710

E Ritesh.Jadhav@unic-nasco.com <mailto:Ritesh.Jadhav@>
